definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Her week-day clothes had been tossed here and there in her haste.

sentences.english: T'ao seemed to be very poor, and ate his meals at Ma's house every day.

sentences.english: Could it be said that I always complained in workdays?

sentences.english: In Kabul, the Afghan capital, the streets are quieter than usual.

all year round/for years on end/average year
